name: Respawn Loop
description:
Respawn Loop is a Puzzle-Platformer made in around 40 hours for the Wowie! Game Jam. This is my first completed game using the Godot Engine. 

The goal of each level is to reach the golden orb. You must use your platforming skills to get to the end of each level. Not all jumps are possible. You must use your previous attempts to help you reach the end of the level! Failure is progress!

Can you get through all 10 levels?

Controls:
A/D - Left/Right
W - Jump
R - Restart
Space - Respawn
